name: ts3or2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
body: |- wi(w0, wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)))

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)), wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3)))
-| wb(wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)), wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3)))
-| wb(wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)), wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3)))

body.origin: |- wi(w0, wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)))
-| wb(wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)), wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3)))

stmt.origin: orbi2i(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)), wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3)))
-| wb(w3o(w1, w2, w3), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(w0, wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), w3o(w1, w2, w3)))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for triple logical disjunction, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 25-Mar-2018.)
